class wp4.compare.models.transplantation.OrganAllocation(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Organs can be allocated multiple times before finding a definitive recipient. This class acts as the record of these allocations and a link between Organ and Recipient.

Parameters:
  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – “ID”
  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “record locked” - locked by the admin team
  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – “live”
  • organ_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “organ”
  • perfusion_technician_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “OA01 name of transplant technician”
  • call_received (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “OA02 call received from transplant co-ordinator at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • call_received_unknown (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “call received unknown” - Internal unknown flag
  • transplant_hospital_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “OA03 transplant hospital”
  • theatre_contact_id (django.db.models.ForeignKey) – “OA04 name of the theatre contact”
  • scheduled_start (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “OA05 scheduled start” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050

  • depart_perfusion_centre (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “OA07 departure from hub” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future

  • journey_remarks (django.db.models.TextField) – “OA09 journey notes”
  • reallocated (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “OA10 reallocated”

  • reallocation_reason_other (django.db.models.CharField) – “OA12 other reason”

organÂ¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

clean()[source]Â¶

Clears the following fields of data if their corresponding unknown flag is set to True

  • call_received
  • scheduled_start
  • technician_arrival
  • depart_perfusion_centre
  • arrival_at_recipient_hospital

Error if:

  • reallocated is set (True or False), but transplant_hospital is empty (OAv01)
  • reallocated is set (True or False), but perfusion_technician is empty (OAv02)

class wp4.compare.models.transplantation.Recipient(*args, **kwargs)[source]Â¶

Extension of an Patient record (via OneToOne link for good ORM/DB management) to capture the Recipient specific data.

Linked also to a single Organ (Kidney), and, for convenience, an OrganAllocation (once confirmed)

Also holds the meta-data specific to the Transplantation Form

Parameters:
  • id (django.db.models.AutoField) – “ID”
  • record_locked (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “record locked” - locked by the admin team
  • live (livefield.fields.LiveField) – “live”
  • person_id (django.db.models.OneToOneField) – “person” - Internal link to Patient
  • organ_id (django.db.models.OneToOneField) – “organ” - Internal link to Organ
  • allocation_id (django.db.models.OneToOneField) – “allocation” - Internal link to OrganAllocation
  • signed_consent (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE13 informed consent given”
  • single_kidney_transplant (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE14 receiving one kidney”
  • renal_disease (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE15 renal disease”
  • renal_disease_other (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE16 other renal disease”
  • pre_transplant_diuresis (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE17 diuresis (ml/24hr)”
  • knife_to_skin (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE18 knife to skin time” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • perfusate_measure (django.db.models.FloatField) – “RE19 pO2 perfusate”
  • perfusion_stopped (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE20 stop machine perfusion” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • organ_cold_stored (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “RE21 kidney was cold stored?”
  • tape_broken (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE22 tape over regulator broken”
  • removed_from_machine_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE23 kidney removed from machine at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • oxygen_full_and_open (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE24 oxygen full and open”
  • organ_untransplantable (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE25 kidney discarded” - REh25 Either answer means further questions will open below
  • organ_untransplantable_reason (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE26 untransplantable because”
  • anesthesia_started_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE27 start anesthesia at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • incision (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE28 incision”
  • transplant_side (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE29 transplant side”
  • arterial_problems (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE30 arterial problems”
  • arterial_problems_other (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE31 arterial problems other”
  • venous_problems (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE32 venous problems”
  • venous_problems_other (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE33 venous problems other”
  • anastomosis_started_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE34 start anastomosis at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • anastomosis_started_at_unknown (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “anastomosis started at unknown” - Internal unknown flag
  • reperfusion_started_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE35 start reperfusion at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • reperfusion_started_at_unknown (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “reperfusion started at unknown” - Internal unknown flag
  • mannitol_used (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE36 mannitol used”
  • other_diurectics (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE37 other diurectics used”
  • other_diurectics_details (django.db.models.CharField) – “RE38 other diurectics detail”
  • systolic_blood_pressure (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE39 systolic blood pressure at reperfusion” - Value must be in range 10-200
  • cvp (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE40 cvp at reperfusion”
  • intra_operative_diuresis (django.db.models.PositiveSmallIntegerField) – “RE41 intra-operative diuresis”
  • successful_conclusion (django.db.models.BooleanField) – “RE42 successful conclusion”
  • operation_concluded_at (django.db.models.DateTimeField) – “RE43 operation concluded at” - Date must be fall within 1900-2050, and not be in the future
  • probe_cleaned (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE44 temperature and flow probe cleaned”
  • ice_removed (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE45 ice and water removed”
  • oxygen_flow_stopped (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE46 oxygen flow stopped”
  • oxygen_bottle_removed (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE47 oxygen bottle removed”
  • box_cleaned (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE48 box kidney assist cleaned”
  • batteries_charged (django.db.models.NullBooleanField) – “RE49 batteries charged”
  • cleaning_log (django.db.models.TextField) – “RE50 cleaning log notes”

clean()[source]Â¶

Clears the following fields of data if their corresponding unknown flag is set to True

  • anastomosis_started_at
  • reperfusion_started_at

Error if transplantation_form_completed is True, and:

  • perfusion_stopped is empty (REv01)
  • removed_from_machine_at is empty (REv02)
  • anesthesia_started_at is empty (REv03)
  • anastomosis_started_at is empty (REv04)
  • reperfusion_started_at is empty (REv05)
age_from_dobÂ¶

Returns the calculated age of the Recipient

Returns:Recipient’s age in years as calculated from their Date of Birth
Return type:int
trial_idÂ¶

Returns the Donor Trial ID combined with the Location (L or R) for the Organ

Returns:‘WP4cctnns’
Return type:str

qualityoflife_setÂ¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

resourcelog_setÂ¶

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.
